frame.name: Substance_by_phase
frame.definition: <def-root>In this frame a <fen>Patient</fen> is in a phase brought about after a change of phase. This can be its inherent phase or indicate that it is returned to its inherent state. <ex>Collect up the <t>thawed</t> <fex name="Patient">water</fex> from the freezer section.</ex> <ex>Put under the broiler until <fex name="Patient">the cheese</fex> becomes <t>melted</t>.</ex> <ex>Major companies are switching to <t>liquefied</t> <fex name="Patient">natural gas</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Substance
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Substance</fen> is the entity which has had its phase altered.</def-root>

FE.name: Subregion
FE.definition: <def-root>The part of the <fen>Patient</fen> that is in an altered state. <ex>The turkey was only <t>defrosted</t> <fex name="Sub">on the top</fex>.</ex></def-root>
